*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas R. Learning to Austin, Philadelphia, May 8, 1828, Requests information in order to assist Austin in colonizing Austin's map of Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Philada */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-08-1828">May 8th 1828*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Esq*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*********/p*
*p*I feel disposed Sir to try to advance your interests in colonising your *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*and for this purpose would advise your sending me specific terms at length, which you grant to *person_mentioned*Settlers */person_mentioned*containing also a fuller description of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*its face, health, situation, productions local advantages and the kind of *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*already there, their religion, whether all sects are tolerated there, if there is any established religion of the Government and how it is supported. I applied to *person_mentioned*Mr Tanner*/person_mentioned* as you requested respecting publishing a map of *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*to which he acceded eagerly. He said that he would be at all the expense of engr[aving] and publishing and [furnish] you with a certain number of copies to be hereafter agreed upon. He supposed that as *location_mentioned*Coahuila */location_mentioned*was a part of the province of *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*you meant to include that. I could not answer this*/p*.
*p*I have just seen *person_mentioned*Mr Tanner*/person_mentioned* and he thinks the *location_mentioned*map */location_mentioned*should be about 45 by 33 inches and advises your laying it down on that scale He says he could not allow you more than a dozen copies for yourself as he must rely considerably on the sale by you to disburse the expenses. Not being willing to delay writing you any longer and being about to set off on a Journey *date_mentioned n="05-09-1828">tomorrow*/date_mentioned*, I am compelled to be brief in this * * **/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thos K. Leaming*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
